author: Pinx Salon
content: We have used DB Entertainment for our Annual Charity Fun Day since 2013 and have always been really impressed with their service from start to finish. The quality of the equipment is well maintained and a risk assessment is in place for each piece. We always book the activities to be staffed and powered, which leaves us to concentrate on other aspects on the day. The staff are fantastic, professional, all in uniform and follow any instructions given, we will definitely be using them for years to come, thank you Team DB!
